createdAt.description: The date and time when the segmentation was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the segmentation was last updated.

id.description: The unique identifier for the segmentation.

description.description: A brief description of the segmentation.

url.description: The URL for accessing the segmentation data.

status.description: The current status of the segmentation.

folder.description: Information about the folder where the segmentation is stored.

value.description: The value associated with the folder.
